values.name: my-unique-research
values.description: References the unique unit upgrade for the players current civilisation
note: This research is NOT available in All Tech games.

values.name: my-unique-unit-upgrade
values.description: References the unique unit upgrade for the players current civilisation
note: Unlike the civilizations unique technology (`my-unique-research`) this research is available in All Tech games.

values.name: ri-anarchy
values.description: Huskarls can be trained at Barracks

values.name: ri-andean-sling
values.description: Skirmishers and Slingers minimum range removed

values.name: ri-architecture
values.description: Buildings +10% HP, +1 armor, +1 pierce armor, +3 building armor

values.name: ri-arquebus
values.description: Gunpowder units fire more accurately at moving targets. Increases projectile speed of Bombard Cannons and Bombard Towers by +0.2

values.name: ri-artillery
values.description: Bombard Tower, Bombard Cannon, and Cannon Galleon range +2

values.name: ri-atheism
values.description: Wonder and Relic victories take +100 years -50% Spies/Treason cost

values.name: ri-atonement
values.description: Monks and Missionaries can convert enemy Monks and Missionaries

values.name: ri-ballistics
values.description: Improves missile unit's accuracy at moving targets.

values.name: ri-block-printing
values.description: Monk and Missionary conversion range +3 and line of sight +3

values.name: ri-bodkin-arrow
values.description: Archers, Castles, Town Centers, Towers, Galleys, and Longboats +1 attack, +1 range

values.name: ri-bracer
values.description: Archers, Castles, Town Centers, Towers, Galleys, and Longboats +1 attack, +1 range

values.name: ri-capped-ram
values.description: Upgrades Rams to Capped Rams (+1A, +25HP, +10 Pierce Armor, +1 Ram Armor, +25 building/wall attack, +10 siege attack)

values.name: ri-caravan
values.description: Trade Carts and Trade Cogs move 50% faster

values.name: ri-champion
values.description: Upgrads Two Handed Swordsman to Champion

values.name: ri-chemistry
values.description: Allows creation of gunpowder units; +1 attack for siege units, archers, and defensive structures

values.name: ri-chieftains
values.description: Infantry +5 attack vs cavalry, +4 vs camels

values.name: ri-conscription
values.description: Barracks, Archery Range, Stable, and Castle units train 33% faster

values.name: ri-couriers
values.description: Kamayuks, Slingers, and Eagle Scouts +1/+2 armor

values.name: ri-crenellations
values.description: Castle range +3, garrisoned infantry fires arrows

values.name: ri-crop-rotation
values.description: Farms provide +175 food before they need to be reseeded

values.name: ri-double-crossbow
values.description: Ballista Elephants and Scorpions fire two projectiles

values.name: ri-eagle-warrior
values.description: Upgrades Eagle Scout to Eagle Warrior

values.name: ri-elite-battle-elephant
values.description: Upgrades Battle Elephant to Elite Battle Elephant

values.name: ri-elite-camel-archer
values.description: Upgrades Camel Archer to Elite Camel Archer

values.name: ri-elite-chu-ko-nu
values.description: Upgrades Chu Ko Nu to Elite Chu Ko Nu

values.name: ri-elite-eagle-warrior
values.description: Upgrades Eagle Warrior to Elite Eagle Warrior

values.name: ri-elite-elephant-archer
values.description: Upgrades Elephant Archer to Elite Elephant Archer

values.name: ri-elite-genoese-crossbowman
values.description: Upgrades Genoese Crossbowman to Elite Genoese Crossbowman

values.name: ri-elite-jaguar-man
values.description: Upgrades Jaguar Warrior to Elite Jaguar Warrior

values.name: ri-elite-karambit-warrior
values.description: Upgrades Karambit Warrior to Elite Karambit Warrior

values.name: ri-elite-magyar-huszar
values.description: Upgrades Magyar Huszar to Elite Magyar Huszar

values.name: ri-elite-organ-gun
values.description: Upgrades Organ Gun to Elite Organ Gun

values.name: ri-elite-plumed-archer
values.description: Upgrades Plumed Archer to Elite Plumed Archer

values.name: ri-elite-rattan-archer
values.description: Upgrades Rattan Archer to Elite Rattan Archer

values.name: ri-elite-shotel-warrior
values.description: Upgrades Shotel Warrior to Elite Shotel Warrior

values.name: ri-elite-teutonic-knight
values.description: Upgrades Teutonic Knight to Elite Teutonic Knight

values.name: ri-elite-throwing-axeman
values.description: Upgrades Throwing Axeman to Elite Throwing Axeman

values.name: ri-elite-turtle-ship
values.description: Upgrades Turtle Ship to Elite Turtle Ship

values.name: ri-elite-war-elephant
values.description: Upgrades War Elephant to Elite War Elephant

values.name: ri-elite-war-wagon
values.description: Upgrades War Wagon to Elite War Wagon

values.name: ri-elite-woad-raider
values.description: Upgrades Woad Raider to Elite Woad Raider

values.name: ri-fast-fire-ship
values.description: Upgrades Fire Ship to Fast Fire Ship

values.name: ri-fletching
values.description: Archers, Castles, Town Centers, Towers, Galleys, and Longboats +1 attack and range

values.name: ri-forced-levy
values.description: Militia line units cost no gold

values.name: ri-fortified-wall
values.description: Upgrades your Stone Walls to Fortified Walls. Also increases hit points of gates.

values.name: ri-guard-tower
values.description: Upgrads Watch Towers to Guard Towers

values.name: ri-hand-cart
values.description: Villagers carry 50% more and move 10% faster

values.name: ri-heated-shot
values.description: Towers +125%, Castles and Harbors +4 attack vs ships

values.name: ri-heavy-cavalry-archer
values.description: Upgrades Cavalry Archer to Heavy Cavalry Archer

values.name: ri-heavy-demolition-ship
values.description: Upgrades Demolition Raft to Demolition Ship

values.name: ri-heavy-plow
values.description: Farms provide +125 food, Villagers carry +1 food

values.name: ri-herbal-medicine
values.description: Quadruples the healing rate of units garrisoned inside buildings
note: This command is not defined by default. You will need to add `(defconst ri-herbal-medicine 441)` to use it in your scripts

values.name: ri-heresy
values.description: Converted units/buildings die/are destroyed instead of taking the enemy's color

values.name: ri-horse-collar
values.description: Farms provide +75 food before they need to be reseeded

values.name: ri-illumination
values.description: Monks and Missionaries regain their faith faster after a successful conversion

values.name: ri-imperial-camel
values.description: Upgrades Heavy Camel to Imperial Camel

values.name: ri-imperial-skirmisher
values.description: Upgrades Elite Skirmisher to Imperial Skirmisher

values.name: ri-light-cavalry
values.description: Upgrades Scout Cavalry to Light Cavalry

values.name: ri-logistica
values.description: Cataphracts cause trample damage, +6 attack vs infantry

values.name: ri-manipur-cavalry
values.description: Cavalry and Arambai +3 attack vs buildings and standard buildings

values.name: ri-marauders
values.description: Tarkans can be trained at the Stable

values.name: ri-masonry
values.description: Buildings +10% HP, +1 armor, +1 pierce armor, +3 building armor

values.name: ri-murder-holes
values.description: Removes towers and Castles minimum range

values.name: ri-nomads
values.description: Houses do not lose population when destroyed

values.name: ri-obsidian-arrows
values.description: Archer line has +6 attack vs standard buildings and stone defense

values.name: ri-paper-money
values.description: The player and all allies receive 500 gold

values.name: ri-parthian-tactics
values.description: Mounted archer armor +1/+2, attack bonus of +2 or +4 against Pikemen

values.name: ri-redemption
values.description: Monks can convert most buildings and siege units

values.name: ri-revetments
note: Not sure this is a legit research item
May belong to a modded version of the game and not the primary game itself
Alot of existing scripts define this constant, but I cant find documentation of what it does

values.name: ri-rocketry
values.description: Chu Ko Nu attack +2, Scorpion attack +4

values.name: ri-royal-heirs
values.description: Shotel Warriors are created nearly instantly

values.name: ri-sappers
values.description: Villagers +15 attack against buildings and stone defense. Villagers chop down trees with one strike

values.name: ri-shipwright
values.description: Ships cost -20% wood and are built 54% faster

values.name: ri-siege-engineers
values.description: Siege units +20% attack against buildings, +1 range (except Rams)

values.name: ri-spies
note: Use `can-spy` fact to see if this tech can be researched
Spies is replaced by Treason in Regicide maps
Costs 200g per non-allied villager in most games

values.name: ri-stonecutting
note: This is associated with the "Treadmill Crane" research tech

values.name: ri-theocracy
values.description: Only one Monk or Missionary must rest after a successful conversion

values.name: ri-thumb-ring
values.description: Archers fire faster and with 100% accuracy

values.name: ri-torsion-engines
values.description: Siege Workshop units blast radius increased

values.name: ri-two-handed-swordsman
values.description: Upgrads Long Swordsman to Two Handed Swordsman

values.name: ri-war-galley
values.description: Upgrades Galley to War Galley and Fire Galley to Fire Ship

values.name: ri-war-wolf
values.description: Trebuchets do blast damage, 100% accuracy against units

values.name: ri-wheel-barrow
values.description: Villagers carry 25% more and move 10% faster
